article_title: Medical-Device Excise Tax: The Case For Repeal Needs New Arguments

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Why does the medical-device excise tax still exist? The tax is a universally reviled Obamacare revenue-raiser, skimming 2.3 percent off the sales of medical devices. Outside liquor and tobacco, most Americans don’t see excise taxes, which are levied on gross sales, irrespective of a company’s profitability.
